    create ssmoutputs data.frame

    Source: R/wc_ssm_outputs.R
    wc_ssm_outputs.Rd

    build ssmoutputs data.frame from SSM predicted/rerouted locations

    wc_ssm_outputs(fit, what, dropIDs, suffix, pred.int = 6)

    Arguments

    fit

    final aniMotum fit object

    what

    specify whether predicted or rerouted locations are to be used

    dropIDs

    individual WC DeploymentIDs to be dropped

    suffix

    suffix to add to .csv files (_nrt, _dm, or _hist)

    pred.int

    prediction interval to use for sub-sampling predicted locations (default = 6 h)

    Contents

    Developed by Ian Jonsen.
